TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, they are controlled by me and exist to discover your secret.

I wish for Rage's secret.

granted but it destroys ur mind and u go crazy

i wish i had a pet deep space kracken

Granted,but lag happens and you are killed

I wish for authentic British tea

granted but it destroys ur mind and u go crazy

i wish i had a pet deep space kracken

Rofl. It actually would destroy his mind. XD

Granted, but authentic British tea is now made from Britishium, a fake element. Have fun with your abomination of logic

I wish that money was free.

Granted. money is now defined as 50 kilogram piles of cow manure

I wish for wisdom

Granted. Sadly, the wisdom is what Leon desperately is trying to discover and he now is going to pester you about it.

I wish i could hold this secret over Leon's head forever. XD

Granted. Because it's more fun that way.

I with for a thunderstorm~

Granted you die of electrocution

I wish that the age of steampunk happens right now.

Granted, but it is almost instantly overthrown and everything goes back to normal, except for the fact that there seems to be alot of extra steam, so everyone decides to torture the leaders of the short-lived Steampunk age with it.

I wish that I had technology from the future.

Granted, Its too advanced for you to use.

I wish for a Slow Clap Processor.

Granted. You get a slowly clapping frog.

I wish I was an astronaut in the Apollo program.

Granted,but you in the parallel universe were the last mission never made it back.

I wish to be divided by 0

Granted, you are now a number.

I wish that I was a Kerbal that DIDN'T die. Or starve, or be stranded, or anything else bad.

Granted but you do because you broke everything.

I wish that the unite states was renamed the Industrial States after 2014.

Granted, but then World war 3 breaks out and the nation crumbles.

I wish for the ability to generate electrical fields at will.

Granted, but you forgot to wear the rubber suit that came with your new powers, so you electrocute yourself when you test them out.

I wish that water was poisonous.

I wish that water was poisonous.

Granted: drinking pure water causes minor nausea.

Cure for it is quickly found. Then nations search for one responsible for poisonous water, they found you and send you to an island without cure, so you live rest of your life stranded on tiny patch of ground with constant nausea.

I wish I don't have to sleep at all. But without negative effects of lack of sleep, so I can be awake 24/7.

granted but you get SO hyper that ur head Explodes

I wish I was on Mars WITH a space suit whith extra oxegen and a way home with enugh fuel and them some.

Granted, but you have forgotten your helmet on that space suit.

I wish for Rages secret.

Granted. My god...It's full of stars...

I wish for people to stop referring to me as "Dr. Crayne"

Granted,but you are shunned as people like that name

I wish for a stable hypersonic spaceplane

Granted, but since that it can only reach hypersonic speeds and not orbital speeds, it will never be able to reach space.

I wish that there was a epik battul between The Federation from Star Trek and The Empire from Star Wars.

Granted, but you have forgotten your helmet on that space suit.

I wish for Rages secret.

i said a suit that included the helmet!

Granted, but since that it can only reach hypersonic speeds and not orbital speeds, it will never be able to reach space.

I wish that there was a epik battul between The Federation from Star Trek and The Empire from Star Wars.

Granted but instead of a battle the Federation and the Empire Merge to become the Terran Empire! (see what i did there? )

i wish for a monolith
